#Text=Robert L. McKenzie
#Text=Robert L. " Bobby " McKenzie , Ph. D. , is a domestic and foreign policy analyst , public commentator , and scholar of the Middle East and North Africa .
#Text=An anthropologist by training , his current work largely focuses on forced migration , displaced persons , refugees , and diaspora -related issues .

#Text=McKenzie is a director and senior fellow at the New America Foundation , a former non-resident senior fellow and visiting fellow at the Brookings Institution , a former Democratic nominee for Michigan 's 11th congressional district , and a former Senior Advisor at the US Department of State . [ 1 ]
#Text=McKenzie is also an adjunct assistant professor of international and public affairs at Columbia University . [ 2 ]
#Text=New America Foundation
#Text=McKenzie is a director and senior fellow at the New America Foundation . [ 3 ]
#Text=He is the principal investigator for an interactive project entitled Exploring Online Hate , a joint project between New America Foundation and the Anti-Defamation League . [ 4 ]
#Text=This interactive dashboard monitors hateful activity within a network of over 1,000 accounts on Twitter in near real time .
#Text=According to the dashboard , [ 5 ]
#Text=these accounts were identified based on their regular use of hateful content directed against protected groups , starting with 40 extremist seed accounts and expanding out from there .
#Text=The approach , according to the dashboard , is designed to enable a deeper understanding of the themes , misinformation , and disinformation being disseminated by this network .
#Text=McKenzie is also the principal investigator for an interactive project cataloguing anti-Muslim activities at the state and local level in America . [ 6 ]
#Text=It is most comprehensive and up-to-date source of publicly available information about anti-Muslim activities in the United States .
#Text=The incidents , sorted into six categories , are compiled in an interactive graph and in maps showing their geographic distribution in absolute numbers as well as per capita .
#Text=Brookings Institution
#Text=At the Brookings Institution , McKenzie 's research and writing centered on the Syrian refugee crisis and Muslim communities in the West . [ 7 ]

#Text=In 2016 , McKenzie wrote for , appeared with , or was cited by : Bloomberg News ; [ 8 ] CNN ; [ 9 ] Detroit Free Press ; [ 10 ] The Guardian ; [ 11 ] [ 12 ] The New York Times ; [ 13 ] The Washington Post ; [ 14 ] and The Washington Times . [ 15 ]
#Text=McKenzie also convened or participated in major Brookings events :

#Text=On February 19 , McKenzie provided introductory remarks for a public discussion between Leon Wieseltier and Syrian refugees entitled " Who we really are : A conversation with Syrian refugees in America . " [ 16 ]
#Text=On March 15 , 2016 , McKenzie moderated a public conversation on the Syrian refugee crisis with Filippo Grandi , the UN High Commissioner for Refugees . [ 17 ]
#Text=McKenzie was also involved in a Brookings research project looking at the migrant and refugee situation at the local and city-level in Germany . [ 18 ]
#Text=Filippo Grandi and Robert L. McKenzie discuss the Syrian refugee crisis at the Brookings Institution
#Text=On October 18 , 2016 , McKenzie participated in a public conversation entitled " How should the next president counter violent extremism ? " [ 19 ] [ 20 ]

#Text=The conversation was moderated by Indira Lakshmanan and highlighted McKenzie 's recent policy brief entitled " Countering Violent Extremism in America : Policy recommendations for the next president .

#Text=McKenzie has co-edited a book with Professor Alessandro Triulzi entitled  Long Journeys : African Migrants on the Road , " published by Brill Publishers in 2013 . [ 24 ]

column1: #Text=In his latest book project , McKenzie explores large-scale displacement and protracted refugee situations in the Middle East and North Africa . [ 25 ]
#Text=Michigan State University Basketball Walk-On
#Text=McKenzie played multiple sports in high school and was captain of the varsity basketball team at Crestwood High School in Dearborn Heights , Michigan . [ 26 ]
#Text=At Michigan State University , and after multiple unsuccessful attempts , McKenzie walked-on to the varsity basketball team coached by Tom Izzo . [ 27 ] [ 28 ]
#Text=His total playing time was less than one minute , earning McKenzie the title " the Moonlight Graham of college basketball . " [ 29 ]
#Text=Michigan ’s 11th Congressional District , 2014 Election Cycle
#Text=Senator Carl Levin , Senator Debbie Stabenow , & Robert L. McKenzie
#Text=In the 2014 election cycle , McKenzie was the Democratic nominee in Michigan 's 11th congressional district .

#Text=When he launched his campaign in late October 2013 , former Congressman Patrick Murphy ( PA-D ) referred to McKenzie as " a fantastic candidate -- a top-tier candidate for the DCCC ( Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee ) -- and he 'll be an even better congressman ...
